title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error: cgen_proc: unknown call NAME
body:
by **2852914**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

http://play.golang.org/p/YAX3HV2Arl

2. What is the full compiler output?

prog.go:6: internal compiler error: cgen_proc: unknown call NAME
 [process exited with non-zero status]

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

Reproducible on tip and 1.2 (tested by people in IRC), working on version go1.1
linux/amd64
